process.name: Send Email
process.description: Sends an email with HTML content and optional attachment.

processParameter.name: to
processParameter.description: Email address where the email is sent.

processParameter.name: htmlContent
processParameter.defaultValue:
"Hi,

You have not entered a message for this email. Please recheck your \"Send Email\" implementation.

Regards,
The Automation Elite (SWAT) Team"

processParameter.name: attachmentFilePath
processParameter.description: Optional file path for an attachment.

ns16:sequenceFlow.name: To Send Email via API Connect
